item.description:
The Fugitives Band

http://www.thefugitiv...

www.thefugitivesband.com/

Will be playing a Gig At Jakes
Tavern on Saturday Night on January 19th.
I would guess anytime after 8;30 or 9 would be
A good time to listen to the band.

Jakes Tavern

http://yp.yahoo.com/p...

yp.yahoo.com/py/ypMap.py?tuid=32527673&ycat=95746674&city=Wallingford+Center&state=CT&zip=06492&uzip=06492&msa=5480&slt=41.43412&sln=-72.802742&cs=5&stat=:pos:2:regular:regT:6:fbT:1

Directions:
I 91 North, Exit 14 for Rte 150, Turn Left on Rte 150,
After you go past Main Street but you are still on Rte. 150 /
Center Street, look to the left for 185 Center Street
Medical Center.
Either Park in the side section inside the Medical
Center Parking Lot or Drive Behind the Medical Center / Jakes
Tavern where there is more Parking.

Be careful if you try to drive out of Jakes Back Parking lot
On to Orchard Street because there is a very small
Driveway. There is a building and a metal
Guard rail there if you try to drive out that small
Drive way. I would recommend going back out
Via the Medical Center Parking Lot.

There is some parking on Orchard Street, then you can
Walk to Center Street

The businesses are from right to left facing that side
169/ Mia Boutique, Edeen Attorney, Ecuama, Jakes?s Tavern,
Medical Center and some Reality Co.

There are two doors into the Tavern from Center Street,
but I went in the door to the Left into the bar area.
Go towards the back of the Tavern where there is a
Large lounge area with a Big TV Screen.
That is where the Band will be playing.

I did reserve a table in my name.

Members of Coffee Talk
Meet Up Group are welcome to come
Listen to some music from the 1970s to 1990s.

I did ask and coffee is served.

There will be alcohol served, so those that cannot be near alcohol
are requested not to attend this Meet Up but join us at our
Other Coffee meet ups.

Reading up Wallingford history, Jakes Tavern was one of the locations
Used in A.D. Calvo film of The Other Side of the Tracks.
I never saw the film.

http://en.wikipedia.o...

en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wallingford,_Connecticut

Hope to see some members at Jakes to hear some rock and roll.

This depends on the weather.
This Meet Up will be cancelled if there is a heavy
Snow Storm or Ice Storm. Members Safety comes first.

I will probably take I 91 N to Exit 13 to
Right on Rte 5 to Right on 150 / Center Street.
I used to work in that area years ago and that is the
Way that I am more comfortable with.

We have members in or near Wallingford who have been
Asking us to have events in or near Wallingford.
This event is one of many recent events that we are having
in or near Wallingford.

A member of the band is a member of Unknown Zone,
so this is a joint Meet Up with the Unknown Zone members.

http://conspiracy.mee...

conspiracy.meetup.com/83/

Mike B
Assistant Organizer of Coffee Talk

Organizer of Greater New Haven Unknown Zone
item.how_to_find_us: We have a table reserved in my name in the lounge in the back where the band will be playing.
item.why: Relax to some Rock and Roll
item.name: Fugitives in Wallingford
